plot: The parade occupies only a small portion of the screen, the crowds are a seething mass that do really move and the Independence Bell is nowhere to be seen.
title: Transport de la cloche de l'indépendance
plot_es: The parade occupies only a small portion of the screen, the crowds are a seething mass that do really move and the Independence Bell is nowhere to be seen.
original_name: Transport de la cloche de l'indépendance
